modules.name: Sparkle
modules.comments:
Sparkle is a library that automatically creates interactive user interfaces from type
signatures.

declarations.comments:
A type class for data types that can be used for interactive Sparkle UIs. Instances for type
`a` must provide a way to create a Flare UI which holds a value of type `a`.
declarations.title: Flammable

declarations.comments: A helper type class to implement a `Flammable` instance for records.
declarations.title: FlammableRowList

declarations.comments: A newtype for non-negative integer values.
declarations.title: NonNegativeInt

declarations.comments: A newtype for small integer values in the range from 0 to 100.
declarations.title: SmallInt

declarations.comments: A newtype for numbers in the closed interval from 0.0 and 1.0.
declarations.title: SmallNumber

declarations.comments:
A newtype for strings where "\n" is parsed as a newline
(instead of "\\n").
declarations.title: Multiline

declarations.comments: A data type that describes possible output actions and values for an interactive test.
declarations.title: Renderable

declarations.comments:
A type class for interactive UIs. Instances must provide a way to create a Flare UI which
returns a `Renderable` output.
declarations.title: Interactive

declarations.comments: A default `interactive` implementation for any `Show`able type.
declarations.title: interactiveShow

declarations.comments: A default `interactive` implementation for types with a `Generic` instance.
declarations.title: interactiveGeneric

declarations.comments: A helper type class to implement an `Interactive` instance for records.
declarations.title: PrettyPrintRowList

declarations.comments:
Run an interactive test. The ID specifies the parent element to which the test will be
appended and the label provides a title for the test. The String argument is an optional
documentation string.
declarations.title: sparkleDoc'

declarations.comments:
Run an interactive test. The label provides a title for the test. The `String` argument is an
optional documentation string.
declarations.title: sparkleDoc

declarations.comments:
Run an interactive test. The ID specifies the parent element to which the test will be
appended and the label provides a title for the test.
declarations.title: sparkle'

declarations.comments: Run an interactive test. The label provides a title for the test.
declarations.title: sparkle
